eventDecorators.name: DelegateChanged
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when an account changes its delegate.

eventDecorators.name: DelegateVotesChanged
eventDecorators.description: An event thats emitted when a delegate account's vote balance changes.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The new owner for this contract.

functionDecorators.name: DELEGATION_TYPEHASH
functionDecorators.description: The EIP-712 typehash for the delegation struct used by the contract.

functionDecorators.name: DOMAIN_TYPEHASH
functionDecorators.description: The EIP-712 typehash for the contract's domain.

functionDecorators.name: addMinter
functionDecorators.description: only owner can add minters.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: See {IERC20-balanceOf}.

functionDecorators.name: burn
functionDecorators.description: Burns 1 POE token from the given address.

functionDecorators.name: burnMany
functionDecorators.description: Batch burn POE tokens from multiple addresses.

functionDecorators.name: checkpoints
functionDecorators.description: A record of votes checkpoints for each account, by index.

functionDecorators.name: claim
functionDecorators.description: claim function. Any user can claim (and mint) with a verified merkle proof.

functionDecorators.name: decimals
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5,05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the value {ERC20} uses, unless this function is overridden; NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

functionDecorators.name: delegate
functionDecorators.description: Delegate votes from `msg.sender` to `delegatee`.

parameterDecorators.name: delegatee
parameterDecorators.description: The address to delegate votes to.

functionDecorators.name: delegateBySig
functionDecorators.description: Delegates votes from signatory to `delegatee`.

parameterDecorators.name: delegatee
parameterDecorators.description: The address to delegate votes to.

parameterDecorators.name: nonce
parameterDecorators.description: The contract state required to match the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: expiry
parameterDecorators.description: The time at which to expire the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: The recovery byte of the signature.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.

functionDecorators.name: delegates
functionDecorators.description: A record of each accounts delegate.

functionDecorators.name: forefitMinterRole
functionDecorators.description: A minter can forefit their minting status (useful for contracts).

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentVotes
functionDecorators.description: Gets the current votes balance for `account`.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address to get votes balance.

returnDecorators.description: The number of current votes for `account`.

functionDecorators.name: getPriorVotes
functionDecorators.description: Determine the prior number of votes for an account as of a block number. Block number must be a finalized block or else this function will revert to prevent misinformation.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the account to check.

parameterDecorators.name: blockNumber
parameterDecorators.description: The block number to get the vote balance at.

returnDecorators.description: The number of votes the account had as of the given block.

functionDecorators.name: mint
functionDecorators.description: Mints 1 POE token to the given address.

functionDecorators.name: mintMany
functionDecorators.description: Batch mint POE tokens to multiple addresses.

functionDecorators.name: name
functionDecorators.description: Returns the name of the token.

functionDecorators.name: nonces
functionDecorators.description: A record of states for signing / validating signatures.

functionDecorators.name: numCheckpoints
functionDecorators.description: The number of checkpoints for each account.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeMinter
functionDecorators.description: owner can remove them too.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: symbol
functionDecorators.description: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

functionDecorators.name: totalSupply
functionDecorators.description: See {IERC20-totalSupply}.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateMerkleRoot
functionDecorators.description: function for owner to update merkle root.
